metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11727 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
** DISPUTED ** The libfsntfs_attribute_read_from_mft function in libfsntfs_attribute.c in libfsntfs through 2018-04-20 allows remote attackers to cause an information disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted ntfs file. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in libyal/libfsntfs issue 8 on GitHub.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-11727` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfsntfs-utils - 20190104-1
libfsntfs1 - 20190104-1
python3-libfsntfs - 20190104-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libfsntfs package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20190104-1').
